title: Basketball Practice Facility Fund
description: To provide support for the construction of the Basketball Practice Facility at CU Boulder including design, fees, demolition, relocation, site preparation, contingencies, furnishings, fixtures, equipment, donor recognition elements and maintenance.
marketingContent: To provide support for the construction of the Basketball Practice Facility at CU Boulder including design, fees, demolition, relocation, site preparation, contingencies, furnishings, fixtures, equipment, donor recognition elements and maintenance.
